price: Сабр қилинг. Аллоҳ чиройли амал қилувчиларнинг ажрини зое қилмайди.
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir fa-inna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-muḥ'sinīna
